alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS NORTH OF MACKAY TRACKING NORTHEAST INTO THE LOST RIVER RANGE THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles north of Trail Creek Pass to near Chilly Barton Flat to Mackay Reservoir to 6 miles northwest of Grouse. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph, small hail, occasional lightning, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mackay, Mackay Reservoir, Darlington, Chilly Barton Flat, Willow Creek Summit, Clyde, Herd Lake, Mt Borah, Twin Bridges Airport and Copper Basin Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
